name: Day 3 Plan
values: Quick recap of Day 1 & 2 key takeaways and address any lingering questions.
Explore a more complex or nuanced aspect of the activity's core subject.
Hands-on session applying learned concepts to a specific, real-world scenario.
Collaborate in teams to tackle a challenging problem related to the activity's scope.
Time for rest, informal discussions, and connecting with other participants.
Opportunity to ask specific questions to an activity expert or facilitator for clarity.
Dedicated time for personal application, refinement, or development based on the activity.
Summarize learnings, identify next steps, and set personal goals for continued engagement.
Final thoughts, acknowledgements, and collection of feedback for future improvements.
